revised_title: An Unusual Case of Ovarian Transformation: Hair and Teeth Formation in the Ovarium
tldr: The author presents a case study of a young girl who had an unusual transformation in her right ovarium, where fatty tissue mixed with hair and teeth was found. The author discusses the possibility of this formation being a result of an internal action in the ovarium rather than a connection with a male, as the uterus and left ovarium were not stimulated or capable of being stimulated by the male semen.
